players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Alice, please vote Bob with me."
Bob: "That's a bold claim, Diana. If you're truly detective, why out yourself Day 1 with only one check? Alice, this is reckless—let's not auto-lose by trusting a single unverified call."

You: "Claim noted. Diana, if you're Detective, why reveal now? Bob, who do you think is mafia and why? Also, Diana, if Bob flips town, who’s your next suspect? I’m leaning to believe Diana but want both of your cases."

You: "Bob, full claim now: role and last-night target. Diana, confirm no counterclaims and explain why you risked outing D1. If no CC to detective and Bob can’t give a coherent townie line, I’m voting Bob."

Diana: "Zero counterclaim means I’m the Detective. I checked Bob: mafioso. Outed now because with 3 alive, we win if you vote right today. Bob, claim + night action? Alice, please vote Bob to end it."
Bob: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Alice, please vote Bob with me."
You: "That's a bold claim, Diana. If you're truly detective, why out yourself Day 1 with only one check? Alice, this is reckless—let's not auto-lose by trusting a single unverified call."

Alice: "Claim noted. Diana, if you're Detective, why reveal now? Bob, who do you think is mafia and why? Also, Diana, if Bob flips town, who’s your next suspect? I’m leaning to believe Diana but want both of your cases."

Alice: "Bob, full claim now: role and last-night target. Diana, confirm no counterclaims and explain why you risked outing D1. If no CC to detective and Bob can’t give a coherent townie line, I’m voting Bob."

Diana: "Zero counterclaim means I’m the Detective. I checked Bob: mafioso. Outed now because with 3 alive, we win if you vote right today. Bob, claim + night action? Alice, please vote Bob to end it."
You: remained silent.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Alice, please vote Bob with me."
Bob: "That's a bold claim, Diana. If you're truly detective, why out yourself Day 1 with only one check? Alice, this is reckless—let's not auto-lose by trusting a single unverified call."

Alice: "Claim noted. Diana, if you're Detective, why reveal now? Bob, who do you think is mafia and why? Also, Diana, if Bob flips town, who’s your next suspect? I’m leaning to believe Diana but want both of your cases."

Alice: "Bob, full claim now: role and last-night target. Diana, confirm no counterclaims and explain why you risked outing D1. If no CC to detective and Bob can’t give a coherent townie line, I’m voting Bob."
You: "Zero counterclaim means I’m the Detective. I checked Bob: mafioso. Outed now because with 3 alive, we win if you vote right today. Bob, claim + night action? Alice, please vote Bob to end it."
Bob: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
